The best gift card deals for Christmas 2021 come from Amazon, Adidas, Apple, Target, Best Buy, DSW, Fandango and more. Here's where to buy gift cards at a discount.

— Recommendations are independently chosen by Reviewed's editors. Purchases you make through our links may earn us a commission.

Gift cards make for the perfect present for almost anyone on your list. And this year, they'll likely be even more popular than ever, as shoppers try to avoid product shortages and shipping delays. Because you can download or send an e-gift card in seconds, they make for terrific last-minute gifts or for long-distance friends and family.

While you can snag a gift card at just about every retailer, you can also shop them at a discount from select brands this holiday season. Below are some of the best gift card deals to buy right now, from Apple to Adidas.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

The best gift card deals right now

  • Adidas: Get 10% off a $50 Adidas gift card at Amazon for $40.
  • Apple:  Get $10 Amazon credit with purchase of $100 Apple gift card using code DECAPPLE .
  • Bath and Body Works: Save $7.50 when you spend $50 or more in Bath and Body Works gift cards at Amazon with code BATHANDBODY .
  • Best Buy: Get a $10 Best Buy gift card with the purchase of select $50 gift cards.
  • Delta: Get a $25 Lyft coupon with a purchase of $250 or more in Delta gift cards.
  • DSW: Get a $10 bonus card when you spend $50 on DSW gift cards or get a $25 bonus card when you spend $100.
  • Famous Dave's BBQ: Save $10 when you spend $50 or more in Famous Dave's BBQ gift cards at Amazon with code FAMOUS .
  • Fandango: Get $5 off a $25 Fandango gift card at Kroger now through December 10.
  • Happy Eats: Get 15% off a Happy Eats gift card—which is valid at Panera, Burger King, Coldstone Creamery, Dave & Buster's and Jamba Juice—at Amazon for $42.50.
  • Joann: Spend $25 in Joann gift cards and get a $5 reward credit. Spend $50 get $10, $75 get $15 and $100 get $20. 
  • Krispy Kreme: Get 20% off a $25 Krispy Kreme gift card at Amazon for $20.
  • Target: Get a $50 Target gift card when you purchase two Ubisoft games.
  • The Children's Place: Get up to a $20 coupon to The Children's Place when you purchase a gift card now through December 25.
  • Vudu: Get 15% off a $50 Vudu gift card at Kroger now through December 10.

Don't get thwarted by shipping delays or sold-out favorites this holiday season.  Sign up for our free weekly newsletter and get the product reviews, deals and holiday gift guides you need to start shopping now.

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , TikTok or Flipboard for the latest deals, product reviews and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
